description:
Wage and income tax payers

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73111 Wage and income tax statistics

Definition:
Natural persons whose residence or habitual abode is in
Germany as well as German public service personnel living
abroad with their families are subject to unlimited tax
liability. The unlimited tax liability extends to all
domestic or foreign income. Spouses assessed jointly are in
principle regarded as one taxpayer.
Natural persons who do not reside or have their habitual
abode in Germany have limited tax liability. They are liable
for tax on all their domestic income as specified in Section
49 of the Income Tax Act.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Wage and income tax payers
